name: Collabo-Bots
description:
Just a prototype created during the GameDev.tv Gamjame 2022

Control a robot, switch to other robots to collaborate and achive your goals. Each robot has abilities. Their use however, has irreversible consequences

Free Assets used in this Prototype:
- Animated Robot Pack by Quaternius
- Assetsville Town by Assestsville
- Realistic Starter VFX Pack Vol 2 by FX Cat UA
